text.0: NEW - The National Trust for Scotland has been criticised for selling a Scottish island bequeathed to the organisation by its former owner. https://t.co/8mPicYxbxP
text.1:
EDF accuses campaigners of “scaremongering” and “a complete lack of understanding of how safety cases work". The Office for Nuclear Regulation says the reactor can tolerate more cracks “because of improvements in the analysis methods”.

https://t.co/To0rXcN26G
text.2:
Allowing cracks in a #nuclear reactor at Hunterston to spread is "reckless", say campaigners. They accuse the power firm EDF and the UK Office for Nuclear Regulation of “continuously moving the safety goalposts”.

https://t.co/To0rXcN26G
